tools.name: SBOM Play
tools.author: Cyfinoid
tools.description: A privacy-focused SBOM visualization tool with vulnerability insights, license analysis, and cross-repo visibility.

tools.name: AIBOMmaker
tools.author: Cyfinoid
tools.description: AI Bill of Materials generator for documenting AI/ML model dependencies and components.

tools.name: 3P-Tracer
tools.author: Cyfinoid
tools.description: Comprehensive DNS analysis, certificate transparency discovery, service detection, and security checks — all within your browser.

tools.name: Cloud IAM Policy Explorer
tools.author: Cyfinoid
tools.description: IAM policy analysis tool for understanding and auditing cloud access permissions.

tools.name: GH Navigator
tools.author: Cyfinoid
tools.description: A client-side repository browser and bulk token analyzer that inspects token validity and scopes to assess the control plane of GitHub environments.

tools.name: ADB Auditor
tools.author: thecybersandeep
tools.description: Browser-based Android security auditing tool — requires device connected via USB with debugging enabled.

tools.name: Frida Web
tools.author: zahidaz
tools.description: Browser-based Frida client for dynamic instrumentation — requires Frida server with WebSocket endpoint on target device.

tools.name: CyberChef
tools.author: GCHQ
tools.description: The Cyber Swiss Army Knife - a web app for encryption, encoding, compression and data analysis.

tools.name: Security Webtools
tools.author: dmtkfs
tools.description: Local-first browser-based security tools for developers and defenders. No backend, no data sent anywhere.

tools.name: Password Security Analyzer
tools.author: NaveenJc10
tools.description: A browser-based tool to analyze password strength, estimate entropy, generate secure passwords, and check breach exposure locally.

tools.name: HIPAA-SRA-Tool
tools.author: SaberGuard-LLC
tools.description: A client-side only, no-data-retained HIPAA Security Risk Assessment (SRA) tool. Runs 100% in the browser with no backend, no trackers, no storage. Supports PDF export and JSON import/export.

tools.name: IaC Security Scanner
tools.author: peachycloudsecurity
tools.description: Free Browser Based IAC security scanner for Terraform, Kubernetes, Docker, and CloudFormation with PDF reporting. Everything runs in your browser - no data leaves your device.

tools.name: JWT Auditor
tools.author: dr34mhacks
tools.description: Advanced JWT security testing platform for analyzing, decoding, and pentesting JWT vulnerabilities entirely in the browser.

sbom.description: Software Bill of Materials and dependency management tools

multi.name: Multi-Purpose Security
